nodes.text: The Senate Intelligence Oversight Committee was a Galactic Senate committee of the Galactic Republic that oversaw the Senate Bureau of Intelligence. The committee received closed-door briefings on the Bureau's activities from SBI Director Armand Isard, and was responsible for approving its operations and programs.

The Senate Intelligence Oversight Committee was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. The Senate Intelligence Oversight Committee was originally mentioned in the Star Wars Legends continuity in The Rebel Alliance Sourcebook, a 1990 roleplaying book authored by Paul Murphy for the Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game by West End Games.
